General.Name: Asuransi Kresna Mitra Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Asuransi Maximus Graha Persada Tbk engages in the general insurance and reinsurance business in Indonesia. The company offers motor vehicle, fire, health, marine cargo, money, and engineering insurance products, as well as sharia insurance products. It also offers miscellaneous insurance products comprising burglary, earthquake, personal accident, movable property, workmen's compensation, comprehensive general, product and public liability, professional indemnity, employers' liability, and surety bonds. It operates its insurance business in Sumatera, Java, Bali, Sulawesi, and Kalimantan. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia.
General.Address: Gedung Graha Kirana, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14350
